publisher.publisher-name: The Department of Plant Taxonomy and Ecology, L. Eötvös University

title-group.article-title: A SIMULATION MODEL FOR GENERATING PATTERNS OF SESSILE POPULATIONS

abstract.p: A Monte-Carlo simulation model has been developed for the study of the spatio-temporal behavior of n annual plant species. Restricted dispersion of propagules and local competition among seedlings are assumed. The main conclusion obtained by the simulation of two extreme cases regarding propagule dispersion is that space-related events may have a considerable effect on the demography of interacting plant populations.
